cohortName: [PL 440383001] Depressive disorder referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (440383) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 440383002] Depressive disorder referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (440383) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 440383003] Depressive disorder prevalent cohort, defined as the earliest condition occurrence of 'Depressive disorder' conceptset with no treatment more than 30 days prior and no prior psychosies/mania
[PL 440383004] Depressive disorder without bipolar, prevalent cohort, first occurrence
